relations with regulators has been communicating and countering misunderstandings about what Google does and does not do. "We're trying to be as transparent and as collaborative as possible," Eric Schmidt said. We try to stay well within the safety zone of the way we're operating with respect to the legal issues and the competitive issues. We also argue very strongly that the things that we're doing are very pro-competitive, and I genuinely believe that, he said. Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will oversee strategic projects.
